original_text: Its vestibule faced the outer court, and it had palm trees on its jambs, on either side, and its stairway had eight steps.
korean_text: 그 현관이 바깥뜰로 향하였고 그 이쪽, 저쪽 문 벽 위에도 종려나무를 새겼으며 그 문간으로 올라가는 여덟 층계가 있더라

sentences.original_text: Its vestibule faced the outer court,
and it had palm trees on its jambs, on either side,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 문설주 양쪽에는 종려나무가 새겨져 있었고,

sentences.original_text: and its stairway had eight steps.
